name: Forgotten Fortress
description:
Defend your Fortress at all costs! The Stick men are attacking our Fortress, and each day will grow stronger and more powerful if you do not stop them!
We are the last hope. Failure to stop these men ends with immediate FAILURE. Please protect the fortress so they can not go further into our land!

***Prepare for insane battles***
Upgrade your archers, enjoy magics and super arrows, defend your fortress. 

***** Features *****
* Free - No Hidden Cost
* 1280p Support
* 4 Different Difficulty Levels
* 3 Different Archer Spots To Place Your Archers
* 9 Different Archers (9 Different Graphics/Speeds/Damages)
* 11 Different Enemies (Skeleton Army)
* 3 Different Magic (Ice, Fireball, Lightning)
* 5 Different Arrows(Light/Default, Fire, Ice, Poisoned, Dark)
* 100 Levels And Counting
 * Upgrade characters ability and the fortress in Shop system

***** Magic : Ice *****
Freeze enemies for a limited time. 
Very useful while under attack.

***** Magic : Fireball *****
Fireball rain. 
Try to use before enemy attack.

***** Magic : Lightning *****
Kills visible enemies with Lightning. 
Try to use before enemy attack.

***** Fire Arrows *****
Double damage.

***** Ice Arrows *****
Slows down enemies and prevents enemy attacks.

***** Poisoned Arrows *****
Enemies take extra damage after hit.

***** Dark Arrows *****
Multiple targets.
